abstract: Japanese Prime Min Shinzo Abe, during address to United Nations, says Japan will greatly increase financial aid to people uprooted by Middle East conflicts; Abe seeks to frame both aid and his controversial authorization of combat missions overseas as effort to increase Japan's engagement in peacekeeping and humanitarian work.
lead_paragraph: The prime minister announced a vast increase in aid to refugees and displaced people in the Middle East.

headline.main: Japan’s Leader Shinzo Abe Triples Aid to Address Mideast Refugee Crisis
headline.print_headline: Japan to Aid Middle East as Part of Expanding Profile

snippet: The prime minister announced a vast increase in aid to refugees and displaced people in the Middle East.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject
